name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Charles Stephon WILLIAMS, Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Charles Stephon WILLIAMS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: William J. Hathaway, Erie, for Charles Stephon Williams.
Joseph P. Conti, Lisa M. Schlosser, Erie, for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
737 A.2d 250
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Charles Stephon WILLIAMS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 14, 1999.
Decided Oct. 4, 1999.
William J. Hathaway, Erie, for Charles Stephon Williams.
Joseph P. Conti, Lisa M. Schlosser, Erie, for Com.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
